burgers.name: Classic Cheeseburger
burgers.description: Juicy beef patty, cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, special sauce.

burgers.name: Bacon Deluxe Burger
burgers.description: Beef patty topped with crispy bacon, Swiss cheese, caramelized onions, and BBQ sauce.

burgers.name: Spicy Jalapeño Burger
burgers.description: Fiery beef patty, pepper jack cheese, jalapeños, lettuce, and chipotle mayo.

burgers.name: Veggie Delight Burger
burgers.description: Plant-based patty, avocado, sprouts, tomato, and vegan mayo on a whole wheat bun.
